comment: An absolute value ` F ` generates a metric defined by ` d ( x , y ) = F ( x - y ) ` , analogously to ~ cnmet . (In fact, the ring structure is not needed at all; the group properties ~ abveq0 and ~ abvtri , ~ abvneg are sufficient.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
